description: Number of distinct prime divisors of prime(n)*prime(n-1) + 1.
comments: This is taking prime(0)=1. - _Robert Israel_, Dec 22 2015
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Prepend[Table[PrimeNu[Prime@ n Prime[n - 1] + 1], {n, 2, 80}], 1] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 22 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==1, 1, omega(prime(n)*prime(n-1) + 1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 22 2015(MAGMA) [#PrimeDivisors((NthPrime(n)*(NthPrime(n-1))+1)): n in [1..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 23 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
